title: Bloomberg Markets: NDR's Kalish on Secular Outlook for Bonds
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: NDR's Kalish on Secular Outlook for Bonds
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Joe Kalish Chief Global Macro Strategist Ned Davis Research Discussing worry that the bond market is undergoing a secular pivot from bullish to bearish.
